titleStmt.title: Proposals by William Morgan His Majesties cosmographer, for vending Mr. Ogilby's works in a standing lottery to enable him to finish Britannia, with the second part of Asia, and Europe. By His Majesties authority under the Great Seal, &c.
titleStmt.author: Morgan, William.

notesStmt.note: Creased with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
